description.narrative: Quality disaggregated data from routine monitoring system is available and knowledge is generated on the survival and developmental challenges of children and adolescents, which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Child Health, Child Health (Covid), Early Childhood Development, Immunization, Maternal And Newborn Health. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, more children and women access and utilize quality health services

description.narrative: End-line assessment conducted for maternal and newborn Quality Improvement (QI) initiative Mother Baby-Friendly Health Facility Initiative (MBFHI), electronic Perinatal Death Surveillance and Response (ePDSR) system was developed and successfully piloted in 8 health facilities in 6 regions and Holistic assessment of the health sector performance was conducted. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
